Plot: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.
Title: Happy Gilmore
Actors: Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Julie Bowen, Frances Bay
tomatoConsensus: Those who enjoy Adam Sandler's schtick will find plenty to love in this gleefully juvenile take on professional golf; those who don't, however, will find it unfunny and forgettable.
